article: Kate said "Hello" to Mr. Patel as she entered. She picked a basket and walked towards the back of the store _ the rice was kept. The room was quite large and divided by three long aisles , with rows of shelves full of _ . Besides her and Patel there were only two boys in the store. They were both wearing _ overcoats. They looked rather _ because the overcoats were too long for them. " Watch out ", she heard one of them spoke in a low voice to the other . She walked on to the next aisle and found the _ she was looking for. Then she heard something else. It _ like a box dropping on the floor. She looked through the small space _ goods on the shelf and saw one of the boys picking up a box. But instead of putting it in the basket, he dropped _ into the inside pocket of his overcoat. Kate looked back and _ see Mr. Patel at the door checking through a list. Then she looked through the _ in the shelf again. The boys still had their backs to her. They were putting something _ into their inside pockets and then one of them said, "Let's get out of here. " They moved away from her. When she got to the door the two boys were in front of her. She watched them _ for the few things in their _ . They had both buttoned their over coats. Mr. Patel did not seem to know what they had done. He even _ at them as they were about to _ . Now, Kate decided to stop them.
